summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 MAZDA CX9. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE BRAKE PEDAL BECAME DIFFICULT TO DEPRESS AND IT WAS DIFFICULT TO STOP THE VEHICLE ON MORE THAN ONE OCCASION. MAZDA OF NEWPORT NEWS, VIRGINA WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THERE WAS A FAULTY BRAKE BOOSTER ON THE VEHICLE THAT WAS UNDER RECALL. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 114,000.
